title.narrative: Number of sector counsellors deployed at Danish embassies

description.narrative:
38 sector counsellors are deployed at 18 Danish embassies by December 2020.
Each sector counsellor is connected to a "Strategic Sector Cooperation" (SSC) project with technical support from a Danish authority. Impact indicators can be found for each SSC project.
An overview of SSC projects and sector counsellors can be found at:
https://um.dk/da/danida/danida-business/myndighedssamarbejde/oversigt-over-strategiske-sektorsamarbejdsprojekter/
